verses.verse: Now Moses <S%H4872><s%> was keeping <S%H1961><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Jethro, <S%H3503><s%> his father-in <S%H2859><s%>-law, the priest <S%H3548><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> and he led <S%H5090><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> to the back <S%H310><s%> of the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to God <S%H430><s%>'s mountain, <S%H2022><s%> to Horeb. <S%H2722><s%>

The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to him in a flame <S%H3827><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of a bush. <S%H5572><s%> He looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H5572><s%> the bush burned <S%H1197><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and the bush <S%H5572><s%> was not consumed. <S%H398><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I will turn aside <S%H5493><s%> now, <S%H7200><s%> and see this great <S%H1419><s%> sight, <S%H4758><s%> why <S%H4069><s%> the bush <S%H5572><s%> is not burnt. <S%H1197><s%>"

When Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that he turned aside <S%H5493><s%> to see, <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to him out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the bush, <S%H5572><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Moses! <S%H4872><s%> Moses! <S%H4872><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "Here I am."

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Don't <S%H7126><s%> come close. <S%H1988><s%> Take your sandals <S%H5275><s%> off <S%H5394><s%> of your feet, <S%H7272><s%> for the place <S%H4725><s%> you are standing <S%H5975><s%> on <S%H834><s%> is holy <S%H6944><s%> ground. <S%H127><s%>"

Moreover he said, <S%H559><s%> "I am the God <S%H430><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>" Moses <S%H4872><s%> hid <S%H5641><s%> his face; <S%H6440><s%> for he was afraid <S%H3372><s%> to look <S%H5027><s%> at God. <S%H430><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I have surely <S%H7200><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> who are in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and have heard <S%H8085><s%> their cry <S%H6818><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of their taskmasters, <S%H5065><s%> for I know <S%H3045><s%> their sorrows. <S%H4341><s%>

I have come down <S%H3381><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and to bring <S%H5927><s%> them up out of that land <S%H776><s%> to a good <S%H2896><s%> and large <S%H7342><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> to a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey; <S%H1706><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%>

Now, <S%H6818><s%> behold, the cry of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> to me. <S%H7200><s%> Moreover I have seen the oppression <S%H3906><s%> with which the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> oppress them. <S%H3905><s%>

Come <S%H3212><s%> now therefore, <S%H7971><s%> and I will send you to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> that you may bring my people, <S%H5971><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> "Who am I, <S%H3212><s%> that I should go to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and that I should bring the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt? <S%H4714><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Certainly I will be with you. <S%H226><s%> This will be the token to you, <S%H3588><s%> that I have sent <S%H7971><s%> you: <S%H5971><s%> when you have brought the people out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> God <S%H430><s%> on this mountain. <S%H2022><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> "Behold, <S%H935><s%> when I come to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H430><s%> 'The God of your fathers <S%H1><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you; <S%H559><s%>' and they ask me, <S%H8034><s%> 'What is his name?' What should I tell them? <S%H559><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "I AM <S%H1961><s%> WHO I AM, <S%H1961><s%>" and he said, <S%H559><s%> "You shall tell <S%H559><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> this: <S%H7971><s%> 'I AM has sent me to you.'"

God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> moreover <S%H5750><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "You shall tell <S%H559><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> this, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh, the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you. <S%H8034><s%>' This is my name forever, <S%H5769><s%> and this is my memorial <S%H2143><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>

Go, <S%H3212><s%> and gather <S%H622><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> together, <S%H622><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh, the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> of Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> has appeared <S%H7200><s%> to me, <S%H559><s%> saying, "I have surely <S%H6485><s%> visited <S%H6485><s%> you, <S%H6213><s%> and seen that which is done to you in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%>

and I have said, <S%H559><s%> I will bring <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite, <S%H2983><s%> to a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>"'

They will listen <S%H8085><s%> to your voice, <S%H6963><s%> and you shall come, <S%H935><s%> you and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and you shall tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh, the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> has met <S%H7136><s%> with us. <S%H3212><s%> Now please let us go three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that we may sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>'
I know <S%H3045><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> won't <S%H5414><s%> give you permission to go, <S%H1980><s%> no, <S%H2389><s%> not by a mighty hand. <S%H3027><s%>

I will reach out <S%H7971><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> and strike <S%H5221><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with all my wonders <S%H6381><s%> which I will do <S%H6213><s%> in its middle <S%H7130><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> that he will let you go. <S%H7971><s%>

I will give <S%H5414><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and it will happen that when you go, <S%H3212><s%> you shall not go <S%H3212><s%> empty-handed. <S%H7387><s%>

But every woman <S%H802><s%> shall ask <S%H7592><s%> of her neighbor, <S%H7934><s%> and of her who visits <S%H1481><s%> her house, <S%H1004><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and clothing; <S%H8071><s%> and you shall put <S%H7760><s%> them on your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and on your daughters. <S%H1323><s%> You shall plunder <S%H5337><s%> the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>"
